title: keys
body: why dont i get keys, in 30 games i have recived 1 key. while my friends get keys all the time?

replies.body:
The droprate for key fragments is more of a curve than it is a line. This means that each fragment that drops reduces the changes for the next one to drop exponentially. Eventually, this droprate resets, at approximately 30 days after the first fragment.

Give it some time and you should start seeing more when you hit those S-grades. Check out our [**Hextech Crafting Guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/207884233-Hextech-Crafting-Guide) for more info. Let me know if you have any questions.
Your reply makes it sound like grades actually have any bearing on when keys drop. Isn't it supposed to just be random on wins?

You're correct, it's random. Somehow my brain decided to throw S-Grades in there, likely because I personally see them more when I hit S-grades in ARAMs, but that's just personal experience. Playing with friends will actually *slightly increase* your key fragment drop chance.

Thanks for pointing out my mistake, I appreciate knowing when I'm incorrect!
